reference.title: Hosts page
reference.shortdesc: The Hosts page displays information about the individual hosts that are included in all of the resource pools that employs.

section.p: The Hosts table lists each machine that is assigned to a resource pool. Summary information about each host includes whether it is active, its resource pool, memory usage of Docker containers, RAM limit and usage, CPU cores, kernel version, and the version of that it is running.
You can search for, add, and delete hosts. To display details about a host, click the host name.
